decks.notes: This deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a swarm of aggressive Goblin creatures led by Grenzo, Havoc Raiser. The key strategy is to quickly deploy a wide board of Goblins and use various burn spells and abilities to take down the opponent's life total. Cards like Goblin Rabblemaster, Goblin Chieftain, and Krenko, Mob Boss provide ways to generate additional tokens and pump up the team. This deck aims to constantly apply pressure on the opponent, not letting them stabilize or develop their own board. With a mix of low-cost creatures, burn spells, and disruptive cards like Goblin Trashmaster, this deck aims to close out games quickly and efficiently.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through a combination of countering spells, tapping down opponent's permanents, and using artifacts to generate value. With Urza, Lord High Artificer as the commander, the deck aims to utilize his ability to create a mana advantage and overwhelm opponents with powerful artifacts such as Vedalken Shackles and Engineered Explosives. The deck also includes a variety of artifact tutors like Fabricate and Transmute Artifact to ensure that the right pieces are available when needed. The inclusion of cards like True-Name Nemesis and Tezzeret, the Seeker provides additional win conditions, making this deck a versatile and powerful control archetype in Duel Commander format.

The main idea of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent quickly with aggressive creatures and burn spells, focusing on dealing direct damage as efficiently as possible. Kari Zev, Skyship Raider serves as the commander and provides a consistent threat on the battlefield. The deck includes a variety of low-cost, high-impact creatures like Goblin Guide and Monastery Swiftspear, as well as a wide range of burn spells such as Lightning Bolt and Searing Blaze to clear the way for attacks and finish off opponents. By maintaining pressure and applying constant damage, the deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize or mount a counter-offensive.

The deck revolves around utilizing Teferi's abilities to generate mana, draw cards, and take extra turns to set up powerful combo plays. It includes a variety of counterspells, card draw spells, and bounce effects to control the game and protect the combo pieces. The deck aims to ramp up quickly with cards like High Tide and Extraplanar Lens, eventually casting big spells like Emrakul, the Promised End or Ugin, the Spirit Dragon to secure the win. The inclusion of cards like Temporal Manipulation and Time Warp allow the player to take multiple turns in a row, overwhelming the opponent with sheer advantage. The key strategy is to quickly assemble the combo pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up for a powerful win condition.

The main concept of this deck is to use Doran, the Siege Tower as the commander to create a strong Aggro strategy. The deck includes a mix of efficient creatures, removal spells, and powerful planeswalkers to control the board and apply pressure on the opponent. With cards like Knight of the Reliquary, Tarmogoyf and Stoneforge Mystic, the deck can quickly build a threatening board presence. Additionally, cards like Swords to Plowshares, Fatal Push, and Abrupt Decay offer removal options to deal with opposing threats. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Thoughtseize, Hymn to Tourach, and Collective Brutality to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and maintain control throughout the game.

This deck revolves around Kari Zev, Skyship Raider as the commander and focuses on aggressive play. The deck includes a combination of burn spells, creatures with haste, and cards that punish opponents for playing noncreature spells. The goal is to quickly reduce the opponent's life total through direct damage and fast creatures, overwhelming them before they can establish their own game plan. Cards like Goblin Guide, Chandra, Fire Artisan, and Thunderous Wrath provide additional damage output, while spells like Lightning Bolt and Flame Slash offer removal options. The deck aims to maintain pressure on the opponent and close out the game as quickly as possible.

The key concept of this deck is control through a combination of disrupting the opponent's plays with counterspells and removal spells, while also generating card advantage and value through Varina, Lich Queen's ability to draw cards and create Zombie tokens. The deck aims to control the game early on with countermagic and removal, then transition into a mid to late-game strategy of card advantage and incremental value generation. By managing threats efficiently and continuously refilling the hand with cards like Fact or Fiction and Deep Analysis, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game until being able to secure a win condition.

The deck focuses on utilizing the commander, Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow, to deal direct damage to the opponent through the use of evasive creatures and cheap spells. The key strategy revolves around consistently casting spells with high converted mana costs to trigger Yuriko's ability to reveal cards from the top of the library and deal damage based on their converted mana cost. The deck includes a mix of cheap evasive creatures, efficient spells, and powerful ninjas to maximize this effect and keep the pressure on the opponent. By carefully sequencing spells and utilizing card draw and manipulation, the deck aims to quickly chip away at the opponent's life total and maintain control of the game.
